import React,{useState}from"react";import{searchBook}from"../api/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBookPage=()=>{const[last4Digits,setLast4Digits]=useState("");const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleSearch=async()=>{const response=await searchBook(last4Digits);if(response.error){setMessage(response.error);setBooks([]);}else{setBooks(response);setMessage("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:"center",marginTop:"30px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Search a Book \uD83D\uDD0D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Enter Last 4 Digits"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"e.g., 0001",value:last4Digits,onChange:e=>setLast4Digits(e.target.value),style:{padding:"8px",marginRight:"10px",width:"300px",textAlign:"center"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,style:{padding:"8px",width:"100px",backgroundColor:"#007BFF",color:"white",border:"outset",cursor:"pointer"},children:"Search"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:message}),books.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",marginTop:"30px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{border:"2",style:{width:"800px",textAlign:"center",borderCollapse:"collapse",minHeight:"100px"// Increases vertical spacing
},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{backgroundColor:"#c8e7f1"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:"Book ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:"Book Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:"Author"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:"Book Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:"Edition"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:book.book_id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:book.book_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:book.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:book.book_type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:"12px"},children:book.edition||"N/A"})]},book.book_id))})]})})]});};export default SearchBookPage;
